title: Center for Religious and Spiritual Life
cleaned_text: | |[Find information on weekly events and gatherings](https://www.macalester.edu/religiouslife/integrated-spirituality/) | |[Learn more about sustainable practices](https://www.macalester.edu/religiouslife/integrated-spirituality/sustainable-practices/) 2023-2024 Building Hours The upper-level chapel and the lower-level are open: - Monday-Thursday: 8:30 AM-9:30 PM - Friday: 8:30 AM-8:00 PM - Saturday - Card Access Only - Sunday - Card Access
